General.Name: Knowledge Economic City
General.Description: Knowledge Economic City Company, together with subsidiaries, engages in the development of the real estate, economic cities, and other development projects in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Real Estate Development and Investment segments. It undertakes infrastructure, electricity plants, telecommunication networks, and water treatment plant development projects, as well as other works related to developing economic cities. The company also owns the land parcel; and engages in the investing activities. Knowledge Economic City Company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Al Madinah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Diwan Al Marefah, Medina, Saudi Arabia, 41561
